results.name: a(n) = A087808(sigma(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16383
Index entries for sequences related to sigma(n)
mathematica: Block[{s = DivisorSigma[1, Range[90]], t}, t = Nest[Append[#1, If[EvenQ[#2], 2 #1[[#2/2 + 1]], #1[[(#2 - 1)/2 + 1]] + 1]] & @@ {#, Length@ #} &, {0}, Max@ s]; t[[Most@ s + 1]] ] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Feb 12 2020 *)
